Description: Activate SOE runtime to produce deterministic compliance decisions without modifying core manufacturing logic
Acceptance Criteria: SOE produces valid SOERun JSON with decisions, gates, and explanations

Summary: Add SOE schema set to repo
Description: Add soe.schema.json, rule.schema.json, standards_pack.schema.json, industry_profile.schema.json, and rule_expr.schema.json to /schemas with validation in CI.
Acceptance Criteria: All schemas validate via CI and are referenced correctly by $id

Description: Define rule_expr.schema.json supporting equals, contains, in, gt, lt, exists with all/any/none composition.
Acceptance Criteria: Schema validates and supports all required operators

Description: Implement deterministic rule evaluator matching rule_expr.schema.json semantics.
Acceptance Criteria: Given identical inputs, evaluator always produces identical boolean result

Description: Load industry profile JSON and resolve default standards packs deterministically.
Acceptance Criteria: Industry profile loads and resolves correct default packs

Description: Load standards packs from filesystem, validate schemas, and expose rule list in deterministic order.
Acceptance Criteria: Packs load without errors and rules are ordered deterministically

Description: Implement run_soe(context) → SOERun as a pure function with no side effects.
Acceptance Criteria: SOERun generated matches schema and is deterministic

Description: Convert matching rules into SOERun.decisions with deterministic IDs, actions, enforcement, and citations.
Acceptance Criteria: Each matched rule creates exactly one decision with why metadata

Description: Generate SOERun.gates and blocked_by logic when rules specify BLOCK_RELEASE.
Acceptance Criteria: Blocked gates correctly reference decision IDs

Description: Generate human-readable justification strings from rule metadata and citations.
Acceptance Criteria: Each enforced decision includes readable justification text

Description: Create space.json industry profile with max rigor, unit traceability, lifetime retention defaults.
Acceptance Criteria: Space profile resolves expected default packs

Description: Create minimal Space packs: AS9100_BASE, JSTD001_SPACE, NASA_POLYMERICS, SPACE_ENV_TESTS.
Acceptance Criteria: Space packs produce TVAC, polymeric, and traceability decisions

Description: Create examples/soe_run.space.flight.json as regression anchor and demo artifact.
Acceptance Criteria: Golden example validates and matches runtime output

Description: Add POST /soe/evaluate endpoint returning SOERun JSON.
Acceptance Criteria: Endpoint returns valid SOERun for provided context

Description: Add unit tests covering rule evaluation, decision creation, and gating behavior.
Acceptance Criteria: All tests pass and cover positive/negative rule cases

Description: Extend agent_contract_tests.py to validate SOERun determinism and schema compliance.
Acceptance Criteria: Agent CI fails on non-deterministic SOERun output
